title: Friend or Foe
description:
Jillian discusses how to make social and health trends work for you instead of against you. From fomo, kombucha, apple cider vinegar, to coconut oil and kinoki pads!


This Week's Sponsors...

Go to DAILY-HARVEST.com and enter promo code JILLIAN to get three cups FREE in your first box!

For 25% off your first order visit RXBAR.com/Jillian and enter promo code: Jillian at checkout.

To get $45 off your first month go to talkspace.com/JILLIAN

Go to GETQUIP.COM/JILLIAN for your first refill pack FREE.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
